text:
Здравейте,

Препращам ви имейла от ДХТ във връзка с остатъка който им седи като неплатен

 

From: backoffice international <backoffice@dxtinternational.com> 
Sent: Thursday, January 18, 2024 4:13 PM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Cc: Alberto Leoncini <alberto.leoncini@dxtcommodities.com>; backoffice international <backoffice@dxtinternational.com>
Subject: RE: За плащане

 

Dear Aneta, 

 

I am writing to inform you that we have checked and the invoice no. 3000001338, on our side, has been paid in the amount of 77’500.00 BGN.

You can find attached the bank verification.

 

Please note that the payment detail is referring to a total amount of 404’867.87 BGN ( 404’850.00 + 17.87 bank charges on our side).

 

The total amount of 404’850.00 refers to the attached invoice package, including invoice no. 3000001338.

Please check with your bank.

 

We remain at your disposal.

 

Best regards,

 

 

Enrica Battaglia

 

Tel. +41 91 922 48 43

 

backoffice@dxtinternational.com <mailto:backoffice@dxtinternational.com> 

 

DXT International SA

6 Rue Guillaume Schneider

L-2552 LUXEMBOURG 

 



From: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, 18 January 2024 13:00
To: backoffice international <backoffice@dxtinternational.com <mailto:backoffice@dxtinternational.com> >
Subject: За плащане

 

	You don't often get email from a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification> 

	

Здравейте,

По приложената фактура е извършено частично плащане от 77 051,33 лева. Моля остатъка от задължението в размер на 448,67 лева да се заплати.

 

Поздрави!

Екипа на ТИБИЕЛ

 

Hello,

A partial payment of BGN 77,051.33 was made according to the attached invoice. I ask that the balance of the obligation in the amount of BGN 448.67 be paid.

 

Greetings!

The TIBIEL team
